subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Sergio García, who has played in every British Open since 1998, withdrew from this year’s tournament qualifying because of an infected fingernail on his left hand that made it difficult to grip a club.
snippet: Sergio García, who has played in every British Open since 1998, withdrew from this year’s tournament qualifying because of an infected fingernail on his left hand that made it difficult to grip a club.
